attributes.additional_details:
Smaller dogs should be treated the same as larger breeds. All across the nation smaller dog breeds are attacking our larger breeds and people because the owner doesn't put a lead on it.
If a bullmastiff bit someone  then they would be put to sleep. If a Jack russell bit someone nothing would happen.
This needs to change. Just because of the dogs size it shouldn't determine if it should be on a lead.
This is not a uncommon problem.  The government need to enforce the use of leads and have the same punishment for all breed owners not just so called "dangerous dogs".
